content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation (electrical_id: 29788).
- ElectricityGroup (id 29788) connecting small electric poles at positions (10.5, 7.5), (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) for electricity production; warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warning "out of fuel"; fluid box holds water (≈191.17 at temperature 15) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) and steam output at (-7.5, 24.5), fluid system [160235].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake, status WORKING, fluid system [160235].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) for manual fuel feeding.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 160235, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 160234, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 160247, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 160246, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 160242, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 160251, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 160250, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 160253, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 160254, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 160255, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System Identifier Inconsistency:
   - Multiple connection attempts using fluid_system identifiers (159571, 159655, 159737, 159821, 159903, 159987, 160069, 160153) have failed to locate any candidate pipe groups. Use the verified identifier from the current pipeline network (e.g., 160235) to ensure consistency.

• Repeated Unsuccessful Candidate Searches:
   - Searches conducted within a 15‐tile radius from Position(-5.5, 19.5) are consistently returning zero candidates. Verify that the search parameters and spatial configuration align with the actual positions of the pipe groups.

• Aborted Connection Attempts Due to Missing Candidates:
   - Connection operations are being aborted when no candidate pipe group with the specified fluid_system is found. Confirm that the fluid_system assignments in connection commands match the updated pipeline network configuration.
